official_title: A bill to amend chapter 63 of title 5, United States Code, to modify the rate of accrual of annual leave for administrative law judges,  contract appeals board members, and immigration judges.
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

summary.text: Modifies the rate of accrual of annual leave for administrative law judges, contract appeals board members, and immigration judges to require accrual of one day of annual leave for each full biweekly pay period.
